description: This file provides a C implementation of various OVSDB (Open vSwitch Database) synchronization APIs including selection, insertion, deletion, updating, upserting, mutation, and operations involving parent-child relationships. It contains helper functions for query conditions, parsing results, and executing database transactions specific to the 'OneWifi' component.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_where_simple(const char * column,const char * value)
methods.description: Creates a simple WHERE condition JSON object for an OVSDB query, matching column to value.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_where_simple_typed(const char * column,const void * value,ovsdb_col_t col_type)
methods.description: Creates a typed WHERE condition JSON object for an OVSDB query, matching column to value with specified column type.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_where_uuid(const char * column,const char * uuid)
methods.description: Creates a UUID-based WHERE condition for an OVSDB query on a specified column.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_where_multi(json_t * where,...)
methods.description: Combines multiple WHERE condition JSON objects into a single condition array.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_mutation(const char * column,json_t * mutation,json_t * value)
methods.description: Creates a mutation JSON array for updating a specific column with a mutation and value.

methods.name: int ovsdb_get_update_result_count_off(json_t * result,const char * table,const char * oper,int offset)
methods.description: Parses the result of an update operation to extract the count of affected rows.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_get_update_result_count(json_t * result,const char * table,const char * oper)
methods.description: Retrieves the count of updated rows from the result and decreases reference count.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_get_insert_result_uuid(json_t * result,const char * table,const char * oper,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Parses insert result JSON to extract UUID if insertion was successful.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_sync_select_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where)
methods.description: Performs a SELECT operation with a WHERE condition and retrieves matching rows.

methods.name: json_t * onewifi_ovsdb_sync_select(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,const char * column,const char * value)
methods.description: Performs a SELECT operation on a specific table for rows matching a column value.

methods.name: int ovsdb_sync_get_uuid_and_count(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Retrieves the UUID and count of records matching a WHERE condition in a table.

methods.name: bool ovsdb_sync_get_uuid_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Retrieves UUID for a record matching a WHERE condition, expects exactly one record.

methods.name: bool ovsdb_sync_get_uuid(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,const char * column,const char * value,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Retrieves UUID for a record where a specific column matches a given value.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_sync_insert(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * row,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Inserts a row into the specified table and retrieves the new UUID.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_sync_delete_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where)
methods.description: Deletes rows matching a WHERE condition, returns number of deleted rows.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_sync_update_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,json_t * row)
methods.description: Updates rows matching a WHERE condition with provided data, returns count.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_sync_update(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,const char * column,const char * value,json_t * row)
methods.description: Updates a row where a specific column matches a value.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_sync_update_one_get_uuid(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,json_t * row,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Retrieves UUID and updates one row, expects exactly one match.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_sync_upsert_where(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,json_t * row,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Performs an upsert (update or insert) based on a WHERE match.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_sync_upsert(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,const char * column,const char * value,json_t * row,ovs_uuid_t * uuid)
methods.description: Performs an upsert operation given a column and value.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_sync_mutate_uuid_set(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,const char * column,ovsdb_tro_t op,const char * uuid)
methods.description: Mutates the UUID set for records matching a WHERE condition.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_sync_insert_with_parent(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * row,ovs_uuid_t * uuid,const char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,const char * parent_column)
methods.description: Inserts a row with a parent record specified.

methods.name: bool onewifi_ovsdb_sync_upsert_with_parent(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,json_t * row,ovs_uuid_t * uuid,const char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,const char * parent_column)
methods.description: Performs an upsert operation with parent relationship update.

methods.name: int onewifi_ovsdb_sync_delete_with_parent(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,const char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,const char * parent_column)
methods.description: Deletes records with consideration of parent relationships.
